headline: Business People: Toro names Edric Funk president and COO
summary: MANUFACTURING The Toro Co., a Bloomington-based maker of lawn mowers and snow removal machines for consumers and businesses, announced that Edric C. Funk has been appointed president and chief operating officer, effective Sept. 1. Funk is a 29-year veteran of the company, most recently serving as group vice president of Golf, Grounds and Irrigation. FINANCIAL SERVICES Stearns Bank, St. Cloud, ...
